question: (Sarah of the Clue Crew reports from a particle accelerator at Brookhaven National Laboratory, Long Island, NY.)  Cooled magnets at the Relativistic Heavy Ion Collider facilitate this super phenomenon; current shows no resistance, & gold ions travel at nearly light speed
